snippet: Adding chickens to your urban garden, appeals court strikes down California gay marriage ban, tortilla-tossing on a Texas road trip and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
abstract: Adding chickens to your urban garden, appeals court strikes down California gay marriage ban, tortilla-tossing on a Texas road trip and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: A variety of consumer-focused articles appears daily in The New York Times and on our blogs. Each weekday morning, we gather them together here so you can quickly scan the news that could hit you in your wallet.

headline.main: Wednesday Reading: Adding Chickens to Your Urban Garden
